title: How to Make Vegan Tempeh Sloppy Joes

steps.headline: Heat the oil in a heavy sauté pan on medium high.
Add the tempeh and cook it until it's crisp and golden.
Add the onions and bell peppers to the pan.
steps.description: sauté until soft and the onions are translucent.

steps.headline: Cook the garlic until fragrant and add spices.
sauté the mixture for 2 minutes or so.
Add the tomato sauce.
steps.description: Simmer for 10 minutes or until thick.

steps.headline: Serve the sloppy joe mixture between toasted hamburger buns.

text: Heat the oil in a heavy sauté pan on medium high.  Add the tempeh and cook it until it's crisp and golden.  Add the onions and bell peppers to the pan. sauté until soft and the onions are translucent. Cook the garlic until fragrant and add spices.  sauté the mixture for 2 minutes or so.  Add the tomato sauce. Simmer for 10 minutes or until thick. Season with salt and pepper.  Serve the sloppy joe mixture between toasted hamburger buns.
